description: This data set is about the passengers on the Titanic, including their personal information such as name, age, gender, and ticket information. It also includes information about their survival status, class, and other details such as hometown and destination.

columns.name: PassengerId
columns.description: The PassengerId column contains unique identifiers for each passenger in the dataset.

columns.name: Survived
columns.description: The Survived column indicates whether a passenger survived (1.0) or did not survive (0.0) the Titanic disaster.

columns.name: Pclass
columns.description: The Pclass column represents the passenger class of individuals on a ship, with 1 being first class, 2 being second class, and 3 being third class.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: The Name column contains the names of passengers on the Titanic.

columns.name: Sex
columns.description: The Sex column contains categorical data indicating the gender of individuals in the dataset.

columns.name: Age
columns.description: The Age column contains numerical data representing the age of individuals in the dataset.

columns.name: SibSp
columns.description: The SibSp column represents the number of siblings and spouses a passenger had on board the Titanic.

columns.name: Parch
columns.description: The Parch column represents the number of parents/children a passenger had on board the Titanic.

columns.name: Ticket
columns.description: The Ticket column contains the ticket numbers for each passenger.

columns.name: Fare
columns.description: The Fare column contains numerical data representing the amount of money paid for a ticket.

columns.name: Cabin
columns.description: The Cabin column contains information about the cabin number or location of passengers on the Titanic.

columns.name: Embarked
columns.description: The Embarked column contains the port of embarkation for each passenger on the Titanic.

columns.name: WikiId
columns.description: The WikiId column contains numerical values representing the unique identification numbers of Wikipedia articles.

columns.name: Name_wiki
columns.description: The Name_wiki column contains the names of passengers on the Titanic.

columns.name: Age_wiki
columns.description: The Age_wiki column contains the ages of individuals in the dataset.

columns.name: Hometown
columns.description: The Hometown column contains the names of various cities and countries where the individuals in the dataset are from.

columns.name: Boarded
columns.description: The Boarded column contains the names of the ports where passengers boarded the ship.

columns.name: Destination
columns.description: The Destination column contains locations where the data was collected.

columns.name: Lifeboat
columns.description: The Lifeboat column contains information about the lifeboat number or designation for each row in the dataframe.

columns.name: Body
columns.description: The Body column contains text data with a total of 10 rows and 2 unique values.

columns.name: Class
columns.description: The Class column contains numerical data representing different classes or categories.
